Innovative software craftsmanship
Tell Me More

The stuff

we like to keep ourselves busy with:

Continuous validation

We like to be sure software hase a purpose. We also like to be sure it keeps on having a purpose. That's why we invented Gareth, a continuous validation framework. Meet Gareth

IOE

We like to connect not only some things but everything. That's why we are working on the Internet Of Everything (IOE).

Machine learning

Some call us just lazy. Some call our ideas crazy. Maybe we are both but we like to think that computers can do everything we can do. They just need to learn how to do it.
